Description: This table contains information about various departments in hospitals. The details are like departmentid, departmentname
This table contains information about the doctors like doctored, departmentid, firstname, lastname, specialty, licensenumber
This table contains information about the nurses like nurseid, departmentid, firstname, lastname
This table contains information about the patients like patientid, dateofbirth, firstname, lastname, gender
This table contains information about the exams like examid, patientid, examdate, examtype, referringphysician, examstatus
This table contains information about the exam reports like reported,,examid, reportdate, radiologist, reporttext
The lz_radiology_types table contains information about different types of radiology procedures or examinations, including their names, descriptions, and active status.
